title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.5 - Selection of participants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.5 - Selection of participants

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of this Part, the director
shall select participants for each day placement program from those eligible
youth who satisfy the criteria established for the program. However, nothing in
this Part shall require the director to permit all youth who meet the criteria
for a day placement program to participate in the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

178.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
